bike.description: New 2013 Frame Design, 100% Cr-Mo, Integrated Head Tube, Integrated Seat Clamp, Mid-BB, Removable Cable Guides & Brake Mounts

components.description: Full Cr-Mo, Tapered Legs, 3/8" Dropouts w/ 32mm Offset
3-pc Cr-Mo, 175mm, Closed-nd Invisibolt, Mid-Sealed Bearing, 25T Bubble Sprocket
SE Alloy 36H 3/8" F & 14mm Semi-Sealed R Hubs w/ Double-wall Rims, 9T Driver
SE Top-Load Alloy, Lightweight External Cutouts, Hidden Top Cap
Big Daddy Jackhammer Grip w/ Rubber SE End Plugs
Lightweight SE Seat/Post Combo w/ Padding
